remarks: Rewrite the elements of the partial sum sequence in terms of sequence multiplication.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Sep-2016.)
statement:
smupval.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ NN0 ) $.
smupval.b $e |- ( ph -> B C_ NN0 ) $.
smupval.p $e |- P = seq 0 ( ( p e. ~P NN0 , m e. NN0 |-> ( p sadd { n e. NN0 | ( m e. A /\ ( n - m ) e. B ) } ) ) , ( n e. NN0 |-> if ( n = 0 , (/) , ( n - 1 ) ) ) ) $.
smupval.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
smupval $p |- ( ph -> ( P ` N ) = ( ( A i^i ( 0 ..^ N ) ) smul B ) ) $.
$d A m n p $.
$d B m n p $.
$d N m n p $.
$d n ph $.
